    • Cashier

      public Cashier​(IBetLoggingAuthority bettingLoggingAuthority) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a Cashier with a IBetLoggingAuthority
      Parameters:
      bettingLoggingAuthority - is the IBetLoggingAuthority the Cashier can communicate with
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the IBetLoggingAuthority is null
      Should:
      createCashierAndAssignIBetLoggingAuthorityToLocalVariableAndInitialiseDistributedGamblerCards, throwIllegalArgumentExceptionIfIBetLoggingAuthorityIsNull

  • Method Details

    • distributeGamblerCard

      public IGamblerCard distributeGamblerCard()
      Cards are distributed by a Cashier to a gambler bankteller keeps track of which cards are handed out. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
      Specified by:
      distributeGamblerCard in interface ICashier
      Returns:
      the distributed IGamblerCard
      Should:
      createAndAssignIGamblerCardToAGamblerWithNoMoneyAndCallLogHandOutGamblingCardOnBetLoggingAuthority, notAssignNullIGamblerCardToAGambler

    • returnGamblerCard

      public void returnGamblerCard​(IGamblerCard card) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      When handing in the card at a Bank teller, all betIDâ€™s on it are logged. The total amount of money credit is physically handed to the gambler, and card is removed from the list of distributed gambler cards. The stored betIDâ€™s on the card are also removed. Note: also use the appropriate required methods from the gambling authority API
      Specified by:
      returnGamblerCard in interface ICashier
      Parameters:
      card - is the IGamblerCard to return
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the IGamblerCard to return is null
      Should:
      callLogHandInGamblingCardOnBetLoggingAuthorityWithIGamblerCardsCardIDAndBetIDsAndRemoveBetIDsFromCard, removeIGamblerCardFromListOfDistributedGamblerCards, throwIllegalArgumentExceptionIfIGamblerCardIsNullOrNotDistributed

    • checkIfBetIsValid

      public boolean checkIfBetIsValid​(IGamblerCard card, Bet betToCheck) throws BetNotExceptedException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      check if Bet made with the playercard is possible. this is based on the amount related to the card, and the amount made in the bet. if the bet is valid, the amount of the bet is subtracted from the amount belonging to the card.
      Specified by:
      checkIfBetIsValid in interface ICashier
      Parameters:
      card - is the IGamblerCard used to make a bet
      betToCheck - is the bet that the IGamblerCard wants to make
      Returns:
      true if the IGamblerCard's corresponding MoneyAmount is greater than the betToCheck's MoneyAmount
      Throws:
      BetNotExceptedException - if bet amount is invalid
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the bet or card is null
      Should:
      returnTrueIfIGamblerCardMoneyIsGreaterOrEqualToBetMoneyAmountAndIsInDistributedGamblerCards, throwBetNotExceptedExceptionIfIGamblerCardMoneyIsLessThanBetMoneyAmountOrIGamblerCardIsNotDistributed, subtractIGamblerCardAmountByBetMoneyAmountValueInCentsInDistributedGamblerCardsIfValid, throwsIllegalArgumentExceptionIfIGamblerCardOrBetIsNull

    • addAmount

      public void addAmount​(IGamblerCard card, MoneyAmount amount) throws InvalidAmountException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      add amount to the players card.
      Specified by:
      addAmount in interface ICashier
      Parameters:
      card - card to add amount to
      amount - amount to add to card
      Throws:
      InvalidAmountException - when MoneyAmount contains a negative value or is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a card is not yet distributed or a card is null
      Should:
      addAmountToIGamblerCardInDistributedGamblerCards, throwsIllegalArgumentExceptionIfIGamblerCardIsNullOrNotDistributed, throwInvalidAmountExceptionWhenMoneyAmountContainsNegativeValueOrIsNull
